S3InputConfiguration.description: Specifies configuration information for the input data for the inference, including input data S3 location.

S3OutputConfiguration.description: Specifies configuration information for the output results from the inference, including output S3 location.

InputNameConfiguration.description: Specifies configuration information for the input data for the inference, including timestamp format and delimiter.

ComponentTimestampDelimiter.description: Indicates the delimiter character used between items in the data.

TimestampFormat.description: The format of the timestamp, whether Epoch time, or standard, with or without hyphens (-).

Tag.description: A tag is a key-value pair that can be added to a resource as metadata.

Key.description: The key for the specified tag.

Value.description: The value for the specified tag.

DataDelayOffsetInMinutes.description: A period of time (in minutes) by which inference on the data is delayed after the data starts.
DataDelayOffsetInMinutes.markdownDescription:
A period of time (in minutes) by which inference on the data is delayed after the data starts.

---

Required: No

Type: integer     

Update requires: No interruption

DataInputConfiguration.description: Specifies configuration information for the input data for the inference scheduler, including delimiter, format, and dataset location.

InputTimeZoneOffset.description: Indicates the difference between your time zone and Greenwich Mean Time (GMT).

DataInputConfiguration.markdownDescription:
Specifies configuration information for the input data for the inference scheduler, including delimiter, format, and dataset location.

---

Required: No

Type: object     

Update requires: No interruption

DataOutputConfiguration.description: Specifies configuration information for the output results for the inference scheduler, including the S3 location for the output.

KmsKeyId.description: The ID number for the AWS KMS key used to encrypt the inference output.

DataOutputConfiguration.markdownDescription:
Specifies configuration information for the output results for the inference scheduler, including the S3 location for the output.

---

Required: No

Type: object     

Update requires: No interruption

DataUploadFrequency.description: How often data is uploaded to the source S3 bucket for the input data.
DataUploadFrequency.markdownDescription:
How often data is uploaded to the source S3 bucket for the input data.

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

InferenceSchedulerName.description: The name of the inference scheduler being created.
InferenceSchedulerName.markdownDescription:
The name of the inference scheduler being created.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 200  

Pattern: ^[0-9a-zA-Z_-]{1,200}$  

Update requires: No interruption

ModelName.description: The name of the previously trained ML model being used to create the inference scheduler.
ModelName.markdownDescription:
The name of the previously trained ML model being used to create the inference scheduler.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 200  

Pattern: ^[0-9a-zA-Z_-]{1,200}$  

Update requires: No interruption

RoleArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a role with permission to access the data source being used for the inference.
RoleArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a role with permission to access the data source being used for the inference.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 20  

Maximum Length: 2048  

Pattern: arn:aws(-[^:]+)?:iam::[0-9]{12}:role/.+  

Update requires: No interruption

ServerSideKmsKeyId.description: Provides the identifier of the AWS KMS customer master key (CMK) used to encrypt inference scheduler data by Amazon Lookout for Equipment.
ServerSideKmsKeyId.markdownDescription:
Provides the identifier of the AWS KMS customer master key (CMK) used to encrypt inference scheduler data by Amazon Lookout for Equipment.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 2048  

Pattern: ^[A-Za-z0-9][A-Za-z0-9:_/+=,@.-]{0,2048}$  

Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: Any tags associated with the inference scheduler.
Tags.markdownDescription:
Any tags associated with the inference scheduler.

---

Required: No

Type: array     

Update requires: No interruption

InferenceSchedulerArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the inference scheduler being created.
InferenceSchedulerArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the inference scheduler being created.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 200  

Pattern: arn:aws(-[^:]+)?:lookoutequipment:[a-zA-Z0-9\-]*:[0-9]{12}:inference-scheduler\/.+  

Update requires: No interruption
